title: Liam Atticus Clarke
bio: I'm a creative and passionate developer looking to lend my strengths to an equally passionate team. If you find my work compelling, reach out so we can start building something awesome!

projects.name: Dinner Party
projects.description: Real-time generative show that enables a 3-way authoriship dynamic between ML models, human/procedural directors, and a live audience.

projects.name: Malakai
projects.description: A novel node-based web interface for chaining together ML/procedural music generators in the browser.

projects.name: SVG Plotter
projects.description: Convert SVG files to GeoJSON for use in mapping software.

projects.name: Interactive Seating Charts
projects.description: Find the best seats in the house for thousands of popular venues. Narrow your search by selecting sections or simply zoom in to filter tickets to visible rows.

projects.name: fanxchange.com
projects.description: Consumer site for Fanxchange's live-event marketplace.

projects.name: Unity Mesh Slicer
projects.description: Real-time 3D geometry bisection. Works with both convex and non-convex geometries.

projects.name: Generative Show
projects.description: Real-time generative show that enables a 3-way authorship dynamic between ML models, human/machine directors, and a live audience.
achievements: Co-designed and developed a sophisticated system for running a realtime generative TV show.
Built custom tools for content creators to produce their own narrative structures powered by machine intelligence.
Supported a weekly live-stream on Twitch with guest directors and direct audience control.

projects.name: Asset Graph
projects.description: System for building a searchable graph of files, enabling the creation of ML training workflows.
achievements: Architected a modular system with extension points for expanding supported file types and relational mapping techniques.
Facilitated the ingestion and enrichment of 400k+ assets spanning over 10 years of production for a notable animated YouTube series.
Acted as the primary point of contact for project clients throughout planning, development, and delivery.
Ensured deliverable was compliant with software licenses and helped define an appropriate commercial license for clients.

projects.name: AI Music Generator
projects.description: Tool for snapping together ML music blocks to form novel and dynamic soundscapes.
achievements: Used chunked generation and rendering techniques to produce a near real-time music generation tool which enabled experimentation and play.
Created a custom node-graph web interface for configuring and connecting music blocks.
Worked closely with accomplished musicians and producers to shape the concept and eventual form of the project.

projects.name: Seating Charts
projects.description: Migration, tooling, and scaling for project initially developed for Fanxchange.
achievements: Led migration of seating chart data and related software from Fanxchange to Vivid Seats.
Worked closely with content team to optimize the workflow for producing seating charts.
Conducted ETL on thousands of seating charts from three large data acquisitions.

projects.name: Seating Charts
projects.description: Interactive 3D interface for discovering the best seats at your next live event.
achievements: Prototyped an interactive seating chart to replace the existing solution provided by a third-party.
Engineered an end-to-end solution for industry-leading live-event seating charts.
Caught the attention of a large industry player that eventually led to an aquisition.

projects.name: Live Event Marketplace
projects.description: Marketplace for purchasing tickets to live events across North-America.
achievements: Worked closely with design team to rebuild and modernize fanxchange.com.
Designed and built a solution for deploying customized live-event marketplaces for B2B clients.
Created a 360Â°, gyroscope-enabled, "View from Your Seat" feature for mobile shoppers.
